top_comments_top.body: The longer the game goes, the more points people get.  If a killer is toying with you it's so they (and by extension you) can get more points in the end.

I love this game, but I'm trash. I panic way too much, and feel like I'm letting down the survivors. 

I'm also a bad killer.
Best decision was to stop playing this game.
I tried this game once and don't get it. Seems like a bore fest, and I ended up winning as the psycho killer. It was just a bunch of waiting around mostly.

Have you ever played game?.. From my pov 99% of time it is about survs making it unnecessary long. When you already lost as a killer, they want to open both gates and wait for you there to teabag, and then last one jumps into the hatch, just to suck as much points. Not talking about knocked guy crawling to the edge of map to die there, or some similar unnecessary hide-n-seek shit when it's 1v1.

p.s. f#ck this toxic game and devs
